text: He was begging Wendy to get better quickly, so that he even ripped you up with an air, and I have never loved anyone but you and my father.

passages.fragment: He was begging Wendy to get better quickly , so that he
passages.full_quote: <used>He was begging Wendy to get better quickly, so that he</used> could show her the mermaids

passages.fragment: , so that he even ripped you up with an air , and I have
passages.full_quote: In manner, something of the grand seigneur still clung to him, <used>so that he even ripped you up with an air, and I have</used> been told that he was a RACONTEUR [ storyteller ] of repute

passages.fragment: , and I have never loved anyone but you and my father .
passages.full_quote: "I have never seen anyone I preferred to you, <used>and I have never loved anyone but you and my father</used>."
